title: Wear HelloGitHub Badge
description: Showcase the honor of your open-source project and help promote and operate it
top_text: This is a program to claim open-source projects. After claiming, you can wear the HelloGitHub badge to show the world the community recognition and recommendation your project has received, showcasing the honor of your open-source project. At the same time, claim your open-source project to enjoy more recommendations and benefits brought by the community.

rights.item1: Community Recognition: The badge represents that your project has passed the strict screening of the HelloGitHub community and has been recommended.
rights.item2: Increased Exposure: Completing the claim (wearing the badge) will get more recommendation traffic, attracting potential users and contributors.
rights.item3: Interaction Opportunities: Users can quickly understand the project through the badge, and enhance community interaction through likes, comments, and collections.
rights.item4: Feedback Accumulation: Collect real feedback from a wide range of users to continuously optimize your project.
rights.item5: Author Identification: After authentication, comments you post will show a prominent identifier and will be pinned to the top.

howto.title: How to Claim an Open Source Project
howto.step1: Confirm that your project has been included by the HelloGitHub community, click
howto.step2: Find a suitable position in the README file of your project, paste the copied code, and submit the change.
howto.step3: After wearing the badge, enter your project's README filename:
howto.step4: After being approved by the HelloGitHub team, your project will enjoy more recommendations and benefits.

question.title: Frequently Asked Questions
question.item1: Authentication Rights: Only the author of the project or contributors with modification rights can authenticate. Please make sure you have sufficient rights to claim.
question.item2: Authentication Failed: Only projects included by the community are eligible. If your project has not been included, please submit your project first.
question.item3: Each project can only be claimed once: After authentication, the claimer of the project cannot be modified. Please check all information carefully before operation.
